page.title: 02GREAT EASTON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: This school was founded in 1759 by Miss Rebecca Mead.The first school building was in the village in 1841, A new school was built on the present site in 1882.It is a church aided school.The Chairman of Governors is Rev.Jack Filby.The school has had two extensions,one in 1963,the other in 1975.In our school there are 111 pupils, 4 teachers,1 secretary,1 welfare assistant, 3 kitchen staff ,3 dinner ladies and 1 caretaker.The school has had 2 burglaries. The worst was in 1985 when a BBC computer,two radio cassette recorders and a VHS video recorder were stolen.The school grounds are 2.64acres,which include a playing field,a playground,climbing frames,a swimming pool and a greenhouse.Our school day starts a 9.05am.We can either have hot meals or sandwiches.We go home at 3.15pm.
